t:
Understand this, The World was an experiment – we bought a bunch of different species together to see if you would behave. If you did, we were gonna introduce ourselves to you.

But we never realized that you would evolve this aggressively – you would run down all other species to establish your kingdom. We didn't expect you to escape your cage instead of making it a better place. So, we're finally having this conversation.


We've finally decided to stop the experiment before you go out of the Milky Way. There's a reason we've kept other intelligent lives away from Earth.

            You just don't play along with others.
